resources.string: 27Memes is a fun community for people to share their memes and trolls and explore other gags that each of you can relate to. Whether you are an engineer, a student, a young boy, a girl, a parent or whatever, you can find memes that you can relate to yourself and you can also get your memes on 27Memes so that others can relate to it.
Need help? Have an idea or bug report? Want to tell us what you enjoy about 27Memes? Email us at the27memes@gmail.com or follow us on Twitter: @the27memes.

You can login using your Facebook account on 27Memes with minimal read permissions to view and download the images and content showcased in this app. We will roll out an update soon in which you can tag your facebook friends on memes. However in any page from the Explore section, you can comment on the post that is on facebook and this is to let you know that you will be posting to facebook in that regard. Hence we assure you that we will be using Publish Permissions on your Facebook account to successfully enable your commenting and solely for this purpose only. We abide by the Facebook\'s Terms and Conditions in this regard.
